      • retrieveCurrentBadgeCount

        public void retrieveCurrentBadgeCount(AppEvent.UpdateNotificationButtonBadgeCountEvent event)
        Retrieves the total unread notifications and calls updateUnreadBadge method.
        Parameters:
        event - a custom event object defined in AppEvent class

      • updateUnreadBadge

        public void updateUnreadBadge(int count)
        Updates the number of unread notifications in the notification button.
        Parameters:
        count - the total unread notifications
